nodes.name: Earthbreaker
nodes.effect: 20% chance for Slam Skills you use yourself to cause Aftershocks

nodes.name: Ancestral Empowerment
nodes.effect: Every second Slam Skill you use yourself is Ancestrally Boosted

nodes.name: Crushing Impact
nodes.effect: Your Hits are Crushing Blows

nodes.name: Surprising Strength
nodes.effect: 40% more Damage against Heavy Stunned Enemies

nodes.name: Mysterious Lineage
nodes.effect: 20% more Maximum Life

nodes.name: Stone Skin
nodes.effect: Armour from Equipped Body Armour is doubled

nodes.name: Colossal Capacity
nodes.effect: Equip a Chest which has 20 Inventory Slots

nodes.name: Answered Call
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Ancestral Spirits. Trigger Ancestral Spirits when you Summon a Totem

nodes.name: Warcaller's Bellow
nodes.effect: Corpses in your Presence Explode when you Warcry, dealing 25% of their Life as Physical Damage

nodes.name: Greatwolf's Howl
nodes.effect: Ignore Warcry Cooldowns

nodes.name: Jade Heritage
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Encased in Jade. Gain a stack of Jade every second

nodes.name: Tempest Caller
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Elemental Storm. Trigger Elemental Storm on Critical Hit with Spells

nodes.name: Strike Twice
nodes.effect: Targets can be affected by two of your Shocks at the same time. 50% less Shock Duration

nodes.name: Shaper of Storms
nodes.effect: All Damage from Hits Contributes to Shock Chance

nodes.name: Footprints in the Sand
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Temporal Rift

nodes.name: Ultimate Command
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Time Freeze

nodes.name: Unbound Encore
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Time Snap

nodes.name: Pyromantic Pact
nodes.effect: Maximum Mana is replaced by Maximum Infernal Flame. Gain Infernal Flame instead of spending Mana for Skill costs. Take maximum Life and Energy Shield as Fire Damage when Infernal Flame reaches maximum. Lose all Infernal Flame on reaching maximum Infernal Flame. 10% of Infernal Flame lost per second if none was gained in the past 2 seconds.

nodes.name: Bringer of Flame
nodes.effect: While not on Low Infernal Flame, all Damage from you and your Minions contributes to Ignite Chance and Magnitude.

nodes.name: Demonic Possession
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Demon Form.

nodes.name: Loyal Hellhound
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Summon Infernal Hound. 20% of Damage from Hits is taken from your Hellhound's Life before you.

nodes.name: Sanguimancy
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Life Remnants. Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to Base Mana Cost.

nodes.name: Gore Spike
nodes.effect: 1% increased Critical Damage Bonus per 20 Life.

nodes.name: Vitality Siphon
nodes.effect: 10% of Spell Damage Leeched as Life.

nodes.name: Crimson Power
nodes.effect: Gain Energy Shield from equipped Body Armour as extra maximum Life.

nodes.name: Endless Munitions
nodes.effect: Skills fire an additional Projectile.

nodes.name: Gathering Winds
nodes.effect: Gain Tailwind on Skill use. Lose all Tailwind when Hit.

nodes.name: Eagle Eyes
nodes.effect: You have no Accuracy Penalty at Distance.

nodes.name: Contagious Contamination
nodes.effect: The most Damaging Poison on Enemies you Kill is Spread to other Enemies within 1.5 metres.

nodes.name: Overwhelming Toxicity
nodes.effect: Double the number of Poisons you can inflict on Enemies. 35% less Poison Duration.

nodes.name: Running Assault
nodes.effect: 30% less Movement Speed Penalty when using Skills while moving.

nodes.name: Bleeding Concoction
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Bleeding Concoction.

nodes.name: Fulminating Concoction
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Fulminating Concoction.

nodes.name: Relentless Pursuit
nodes.effect: Immune to Slows.

nodes.name: Witchbane
nodes.effect: Enemies have Maximum Concentration equal to 40% of their Maximum Life. Break enemy Concentration on Hit equal to 100% of Damage Dealt. Enemies regain 10% of Concentration every second if they haven't lost Concentration in the past 5 seconds.

nodes.name: No Mercy
nodes.effect: Deal up to 30% more Damage to Enemies based on their missing Concentration.

nodes.name: Pitiless Killer
nodes.effect: Culling Strike.

nodes.name: Judge, Jury, and Executioner
nodes.effect: Decimating Strike.

nodes.name: Obsessive Rituals
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Sorcery Ward. 50% less Armour and Evasion Rating.

nodes.name: Zealous Inquisition
nodes.effect: 10% chance for Enemies you Kill to Explode, dealing 100% of their maximum Life as Physical Damage. Chance is doubled against Undead and Demons.

nodes.name: Crystalline Potential
nodes.effect: +12% to Quality of all Skill Gems.

nodes.name: Integrated Efficiency
nodes.effect: Grants 3 additional Skill Slots.

nodes.name: Thaumaturgical Infusion
nodes.effect: +1% to maximum Cold Resistance per 3 Blue Support Gems Socketed anywhere. +1% to maximum Fire Resistance per 3 Red Support Gems Socketed anywhere. +1% to maximum Lightning Resistance per 3 Green Support Gems Socketed anywhere.

nodes.name: Adaptive Capability
nodes.effect: Attribute Requirements of Gems can be satisfied by your highest Attribute.

nodes.name: ...and Scatter Them to the Winds
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Elemental Expression. Trigger Elemental Expression on Melee Critical Hit.

nodes.name: I am the Blizzard...
nodes.effect: Gain 10% of Damage as Extra Cold Damage. On Freezing Enemies create Chilled Ground.

nodes.name: I am the Thunder...
nodes.effect: Gain 10% of Damage as Extra Lightning Damage. 25% chance on Shocking Enemies to create Shocked Ground.

nodes.name: ...and I Shall Rage
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Unbound Avatar.
nodes.prerequisite: I am the Blizzard... or I am the Thunder...

nodes.name: Faith is a Choice
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Meditate.

nodes.name: Embrace the Darkness
nodes.effect: Remove all Spirit. Base Maximum Darkness is 100. For each Life or Energy Shield lost to Damage, reserve 1 Darkness instead if possible. Darkness Reservation lasts for 10 seconds. +5 to Maximum Darkness per Level.

nodes.name: Grasp of the Void
nodes.effect: Gain 1% of Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per 20 Unreserved Darkness.

nodes.name: Ravenous Doubts
nodes.effect: Mana Leech is instant.

nodes.name: Consuming Questions
nodes.effect: You cannot Recharge Energy Shield. Mana Leech effects also Recover Energy Shield.

nodes.name: Waking Dream
nodes.effect: Grants Skill: Into the Breach.

nodes.name: Chayula's Gift
nodes.effect: +10% to Maximum Chaos Resistance. Chaos Resistance is doubled.
